title: Theresa May to step down as PM at general election
description: Former PM says she wants to focus on causes close to her heart after 27 years in parliament

title: Jusuf Nurkic pulls down Suns-record 31 rebounds vs. Thunder
description: Jusuf Nurkic pulled down a franchise-high 31 rebounds, the most by any player since the 2010-11 season

title: United to pause pilot hiring, citing Boeing’s delivery delays
description: United Airlines will pause pilot hiring this spring because of Boeing delivery delays, the latest effect of the plane maker’s problems on one of its biggest customers.

title: Nikon is acquiring US camera manufacturer RED
description: RED will become a subsidiary of Nikon as it attempts to expand into the digital cinema camera market.

title: First 'Deadpool & Wolverine' Teaser Debuts During The Big Game
description: Marvel Studios’ DEADPOOL & WOLVERINE opens in U.S. & Canadian movie theaters on July 26, and will be available in IMAX, RealD 3D, Dolby Cinema, 4DX, Cinemark XD, and premium screens everywhere.
